AssignedCastDescription: Commander, there are already a half dozen requests for new facilities for Gamma Pod, ranging from a swimming pool to a DropShip-sized bouncy castle. On a more practical note, we could also begin using the Gamma Pod medical facilities.

Description.Details: Gamma Pod is very much a blank slate, as only its internal support structures survived intact. Rebuilding the habitation decks of the pod still leaves plenty of space for other facilities.
Description.Name: Gamma Pod
